name: Space Id Please
description:
"You play a space border guard, your goal is to make sure that no intruder crosses your border or you risk being punished by the high space government."

Space ID Please is a Virtual Reality SF game that was made in 5 days during a workshop in a student programing class.

-Lifetime : 15-20 min

-The game is excusively in french (soon update for english)
